title: [FEATURE] Include `SkiaSharp.Views.WinUI` in `SkiaSharp.Views.Uno.WinUI`
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

Currently it seems that to use SkiaSharp in a Uno Platform WinUI project, we need to do something like:

```xml
<Choose>
	<When Condition="$(IsWinAppSdk)">
		<ItemGroup>
			<PackageReference Include="SkiaSharp.Views.WinUI" />
		</ItemGroup>
	</When>
	<Otherwise>
		<ItemGroup>
			<PackageReference Include="SkiaSharp.Views.Uno.WinUI" />
		</ItemGroup>
	</Otherwise>
</Choose>
```

### Describe the solution you would like

It would be best if the SkiaSharp.Views.Uno.WinUI also included the WinUI target, so that this wouldn't be needed.

### Describe alternatives you have considered

Installing separate packages
